title: Visual Authoring Tool Utilization for Connectivist MOOC Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic MOOC platform operation methods and intermediate-level science domain knowledge
context.additional_context: Digital environment utilizing learners' personal devices, with project-based assessments to measure learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain the core principles of connectivist MOOC design
Learners can design science domain cMOOC scenarios using visual authoring tools
Learners can simulate the process of deploying designed scenarios on an LMS in a simulated environment
Learners can improve and finalize project-based outcomes through peer assessment

resources: Open-source content library for science disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
